title: Scrubber Parameters
description: Factors that control the behavior of a Java class that removes non-public parts of a data object before the object is shared

removeDates.comments: When selected, remove all date fields from output
removeDates.title: Remove dates

removeAllLocked.comments: When selected, remove any data element that is marked as non-public
removeAllLocked.title: Remove all locked

removeAllLockedAccessGroupsToInclude.comments: Names of access groups that will NOT be removed
removeAllLockedAccessGroupsToInclude.title: Access groups to include

removeAllLockedRemoveElementsIfNoExporta.comments: Elements to remove when they have no public references
removeAllLockedRemoveElementsIfNoExporta.title: Remove elements if no exportable selected public domain reference

removeElementsIfNoExportablePublicRefEle.comments: Elements to remove when the substance has no public references
removeElementsIfNoExportablePublicRefEle.title: Elements to remove

removeCodesBySystem.comments: When selected, remove any codes whose code system is on the list
removeCodesBySystem.title: Remove codes by system

removeReferencesByCriteria.comments: When selected, remove any references that meet specified criteria
removeReferencesByCriteria.title: Remove references by criteria

removeReferencesByCriteriaReferenceTypes.comments: Document types to look at. When a reference is of that document type, remove it
removeReferencesByCriteriaReferenceTypes.title: Reference types to remove

removeReferencesByCriteriaCitationPatter.comments: Patterns (RegExes) to apply to reference citation.  When a citation matches, remove the reference
removeReferencesByCriteriaCitationPatter.title: Citation patterns to remove

removeReferencesByCriteriaExcludeReferen.comments: Remove references by looking at citationPatternsToRemove
removeReferencesByCriteriaExcludeReferen.title: Exclude reference by pattern

substanceReferenceCleanup.comments: When selected, next criteria are used to process substance references
substanceReferenceCleanup.title: Substance reference cleanup

substanceReferenceCleanupActionForDefini.comments: Define what happens when a referenced substance that's part of a definition would be filtered out by the scrubber.
substanceReferenceCleanupActionForDefini.title: What action should be taken when a definition depends on a referenced substance which would be scrubbed out?

substanceReferenceCleanupActionForRelati.comments: Define what happens when a referenced substance that's NOT part of a definition (e.g. relationship) would be filtered out by the scrubber.
substanceReferenceCleanupActionForRelati.title: What action should be taken when a record references a scrubbed-out substance in a non-defining way (e.g. relationships)?

removeChangeReason.comments: When selected, delete the 'Change Reason' field
removeChangeReason.title: Remove change reason

approvalIdCleanup.comments: Apply additional criteria to the approval ID field
approvalIdCleanup.title: Approval ID clean-up

approvalIdCleanupRemoveApprovalId.comments: The record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is removed
approvalIdCleanupRemoveApprovalId.title: Remove approval ID

approvalIdCleanupCopyApprovalIdToCode.comments: The record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is copied to a code
approvalIdCleanupCopyApprovalIdToCode.title: Copy approval ID to code if code not already present

approvalIdCleanupApprovalIdCodeSystem.comments: When this parameter has a value, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is copied to a code of this specified system
approvalIdCleanupApprovalIdCodeSystem.title: Copy approval ID to code with following code system (if not already present)

UUIDCleanup.comments: Apply additional criteria to the top-level UUID field
UUIDCleanup.title: Clean up (top-level) UUIDs

regenerateUUIDs.comments: All UUIDs in the object being exported will be given a newly-generated value
regenerateUUIDs.title: Regenerate UUIDs

UUIdCleanupCopyUUIDIdToCode.comments: The record's UUID (system-generated identifier) is copied to a code
UUIdCleanupCopyUUIDIdToCode.title: Copy UUID to code if code not already present

UUIDCleanupUUIDCodeSystem.comments: When this parameter has a value, the record's top-level UUID (system-generated identifier) is copied to a code of this specified system
UUIDCleanupUUIDCodeSystem.title: Copy UUID to code with following code system (if not already present)

changeAllStatuses.comments: All status value in the object being exported will be given a value
changeAllStatuses.title: Change all statuses

changeAllStatusesNewStatusValue.comments: New string value to assign to all individual status fields throughout the object
changeAllStatusesNewStatusValue.title: New status value

auditInformationCleanup.comments: Apply succeeding criteria to audit fields
auditInformationCleanup.title: Audit information clean-up

auditInformationCleanupDeidentifyAuditUs.comments: Remove users listed as creator or modifier of records and subrecords
auditInformationCleanupDeidentifyAuditUs.title: Deidentify audit user

auditInformationCleanupNewAuditorValue.comments: New string value to assign to all auditor (creator/modifier) fields throughout the object
auditInformationCleanupNewAuditorValue.title: New auditor value

removeBasedOnStatus.comments: Remove records if they have a certain status value
removeBasedOnStatus.title: Remove records based on status

statusesToInclude.comments: Records with any of the following record status attributes will be kept
statusesToInclude.title: Statuses to include

scrubbedDefinitionHandling.comments: Apply some additional scrubbing to definitions that had parts removed
scrubbedDefinitionHandling.title: Scrubbed definition handling

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingRemoveScrubbed.comments: When a defining element has been modified, remove it entirely
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingRemoveScrubbed.title: Remove partially/fully scrubbed definitional records entirely

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingSetScrubbedDef.comments: When a defining element has been modified, set definitional level to "Incomplete"
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingSetScrubbedDef.title: Set partially/fully scrubbed definitional records to definitional level "Incomplete"

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingConvertScrubbe.comments: When a substance's defining element has been modified, convert the substance type to "Concept"
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingConvertScrubbe.title: Convert partially/fully scrubbed definitional records to "Concepts"

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingAddNoteToScrub.comments: When a substance's defining element has been modified, add a Note
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingAddNoteToScrub.title: add a note to partially/fully scrubbed definitional records

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingTreatPartialDe.comments: Treat partially scrubbed definitions with the same settings as fully scrubbed definitions
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingTreatPartialDe.title: Treat partially scrubbed definitions with same settings

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingRemoveScrubbed.comments: When a defining element has been partially scrubbed, remove it entirely
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingRemoveScrubbed.title: Remove PARTIALLY scrubbed definitional records entirely

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingSetScrubbedPar.comments: When a defining element has been partially scrubbed, set definitional level to "Incomplete"
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingSetScrubbedPar.title: Set PARTIALLY scrubbed definitional records to definitional level "Incomplete"

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingConvertScrubbe.comments: When a substance's defining element has been partially scrubbed, convert the substance type to "Concept"
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingConvertScrubbe.title: Convert PARTIALLY scrubbed definitional records to "Concepts"

scrubbedDefinitionHandlingAddNoteToScrub.comments: When a substance's defining element has been partially scrubbed, add a Note
scrubbedDefinitionHandlingAddNoteToScrub.title: add a note to PARTIALLY scrubbed definitional records

scrubUploadedFilesFromReferences.comments: Remove uploaded file URLs from References. (These URLs probably won't be useful in another organization.)
scrubUploadedFilesFromReferences.title: Remove uploaded file URLs from References
